channel.title: Software Consulting on Salman Ali Banani
channel.description: Recent content in Software Consulting on Salman Ali Banani

item.title: Philosophy for Software Developers
item.description: Science is what we know and Philosophy is what we don’t know. (Bertrand Russell) Software developers should have some familiarity with the ultimate philosophical questions that have been asked over the last 2000 years, and how great thinkers and writers of the past have tried to answer those questions. My own interest in philosophy began many years ago, when I came across this quote by Russell: I think nobody should be certain of anything.
